about_the_game:
This soundtrack combines uplifting power metal melodies with blackened tremelo picking and blast beats to bring the listener the tension and anxiety appropriate for a bullet hell. Also a hint of butt rock.

Soundtrack is available in MP3 and FLAC. As the game is still currently in early access, this soundtrack is incomplete but will be updated free of charge as development progresses.

name: Astral Gunners Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 330 MB available space
